:::Vulois:::

::Vulois reaches his lair and sits down by the Transmetal 3 machine.  
He wished he still ahd the driver.  It would be easier to recruit new 
members.  he waited for Dachande and Battera::






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> yes it was a typo, the will not be treated differently. 
> 
> ::Dachande/Battera::
> 
>     Battera took to the air as Dachande ran under her.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Alloran2@a... 
>   To: Dachande85@m... 
>   Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 10:26 PM
>   Subject: Merry Christmas(and a couple of other stuff)!
> 
> 
>   Alloran here. 
> 
>   For when you come back, i got some questions: 
> 
>   When Magmatron said they'd be treated differently, or was that 
just a typo, 
>   meaning that we wouldnt be treated differently? 
> 
>   And from now on im going to forward you all my posts concerning 
you, to avoid 
>   confusion.  heres my latest Vulois post: 
> 
>   ::Vulois smiled at their responce:: 
>   Vulois: Good. Magmatron controls you Cybershark?  No need to 
worry.  The 
>   first thing we'll do is go to the Destrons.  We'll convince them 
of peace and 
>   that you should have freedom from control of Magmatron at the 
same time.  Bu 
>   tbefore we do anything in the way of peace, we must return to my 
mountain 
>   lair.  I dont think this cave would be good for a base, not to 
mention that 
>   we are dangerously close to the Alliance. 
>   ::He walks out of the cave and takes off flying in the direction 
of his old 
>   lair, motioning them to follow him::
